ComicInfo.Summary:
The Italians have brought us some of the most noteworthy erotic artists ever, Franco Saudelli, Giovanna Casotto, and Milo Manara, to name just a few -- and consummate draftsman GIOVANNI DEGLI ESPOSTI is the latest name to add to the list!
Lady X: Lust's Captive tells the sensuous and sordid story of Madame de Beaufleur, wrongfully accused of the death of her father and husband by the family doctor... Fleeing Paris for her life, she lands in the arms (and beds!) of a bevy of lusty partners... from a searing threesome with dashing soldiers, gangbang action at the hands of a band of randy thieves -- all the way to sizzling Sapphic sex as the love slave of a deliciously naughty nun! By the end of this epic erotic tale, this lusty Lady will never be the same again! Baroque in its setting, lushly styled artwork, and utterly decadent content. Lady X: Lust's Captive is the perfect treat for fans of elegantly crafted European comics and extremely sexual situations alike!
